Pre-Game Insights: Coming off a heartbreaking loss to the Kings, the Heat are expected to bounce back against the Suns.
The Suns have had some very close wins recently, and experts believe they are due for a loss.
The Heat matchup very well against the Suns.
The Heat averaged 12.7 turnovers per game last season, which was tied for the 5th-lowest in the NBA, while the Suns forced 12.7 turnovers per game, the 7th-lowest in the NBA.

The Suns allowed opponents to shoot 33% from three in close and late situations last season, the 10th-best in the NBA, while the Heat shot 32% from three in close and late situations last season, the 2nd-worst in the NBA.
